reviewText: Seen these guys a few times really like them. Video and audio quality is very good for its time. If you like these guys you will like the DVD.

"The Professor" is Pat Mac Manus's nick name and this DVD proves what a virtuoso he truly is. Accompanied by his two brothers John & Tommy its balls to the floor music, soaking in a variety of musical styles from Irish trad to blues with modern day sounds. 20yrs on and this music still sounds fresh & original.
